metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML Div Element
The <div> element is used as a container for other HTML elements.
content.html: The <div> element is used as a container for other HTML elements.

content.text: The <div> Element
The <div> element is by default a block element, meaning that it takes all available width, and comes with line breaks before and after.
content.html: The <div> element is by default a block element, meaning that it takes all available width, and comes with line breaks before and after.

content.code:
Lorem Ipsum
I am a div
dolor sit amet.
content.code_html: Lorem Ipsum <div>I am a div</div> dolor sit amet.

content.text: The <div> element has no required attributes, but style , class and id are common.
content.html: The <div> element has no required attributes, but style, class and id are common.

content.text: <div> as a container
The <div> element is often used to group sections of a web page together.
content.html: The <div> element is often used to group sections of a web page together.

content.code:
London

 

London is the capital city of England.

 

London has over 9 million inhabitants.
content.code_html:
<div>
  <h2>London</h2>
  <p>London is the capital city of England.</p>
  <p>London has over 9 million inhabitants.</p>
</div>

content.text: Center align a <div> element
If you have a <div> element that is not 100% wide, and you want to center-align it, set the CSS margin property to auto .
content.html: If you have a <div> element that is not 100% wide, and you want to center-align it, set the CSS margin property to auto.

content.code_html:
<style>
div {
  width:300px;
  margin:auto;
}
</style>

content.text: Multiple <div> elements
You can have many <div> containers on the same page.
content.html: You can have many <div> containers on the same page.

content.code:
London

 

London is the capital city of England.

 

London has over 9 million inhabitants.

Oslo

 

Oslo is the capital city of Norway.

 

Oslo has over 700,000 inhabitants.

Rome

 

Rome is the capital city of Italy.

 

Rome has over 4 million inhabitants.
content.code_html:
<div>
  <h2>London</h2>
  <p>London is the capital city of England.</p>
  <p>London has over 9 million inhabitants.</p>
</div>

<div>
  <h2>Oslo</h2>
  <p>Oslo is the capital city of Norway.</p>
  <p>Oslo has over 700,000 inhabitants.</p>
</div>

<div>
  <h2>Rome</h2>
  <p>Rome is the capital city of Italy.</p>
  <p>Rome has over 4 million inhabitants.</p>
</div>

content.text: Aligning <div> elements side by side
When building web pages, you often want to have two or more <div> elements side by side, like this:
content.html: When building web pages, you often want to have two or more <div> elements side by side, like this:

content.text: London
London is the capital city of England.
content.html: London is the capital city of England.

content.text: London has over 9 million inhabitants.
content.html: London has over 9 million inhabitants.

content.text: Oslo
Oslo is the capital city of Norway.
content.html: Oslo is the capital city of Norway.

content.text: Oslo has over 700,000 inhabitants.
content.html: Oslo has over 700,000 inhabitants.

content.text: Rome
Rome is the capital city of Italy.
content.html: Rome is the capital city of Italy.

content.text: Rome has over 4 million inhabitants.
content.html: Rome has over 4 million inhabitants.

content.text: There are different methods for aligning elements side by side, all include some CSS styling. We will look at the most common methods:
content.html: There are different methods for aligning elements side by side, all include some CSS styling. We will look at the most common methods:

content.text: Float
The CSS float property was not originally meant to align <div> elements side-by-side, but has been used for this purpose for many years.
content.html: The CSS float property was not originally meant to align <div> elements side-by-side, but has been used for this purpose for many years.

content.text: The CSS float property is used for positioning and formatting content and allows elements to be positioned horizontally, rather than vertically.
content.html: The CSS float property is used for positioning and formatting content and allows elements to be positioned horizontally, rather than vertically.

content.code_html:
<style>
.mycontainer {
  width:100%;
  overflow:auto;
}
.mycontainer div {
  width:33%;
  float:left;
}
</style>

content.text: Learn more about float in our CSS float tutorial .
content.html: Learn more about float in our CSS float tutorial.

content.text: Inline-block

If you change the <div> element's display property from block to inline-block , the <div> elements will no longer add a line break before and after, and will be displayed side by side instead of on top of each other.
content.html: If you change the <div> element's display property from block to inline-block, the <div> elements will no longer add a line break before and after, and will be displayed side by side instead of on top of each other.

content.code_html:
<style>
div {
  width: 30%;
  display: inline-block;
}
</style>

content.text: Flex
The CSS Flexbox Layout Module was introduced to make it easier to design flexible responsive layout structure without using float or positioning.
content.html: The CSS Flexbox Layout Module was introduced to make it easier to design flexible responsive layout structure without using float or positioning.

content.text: To make the CSS flex method work, surround the <div> elements with another <div> element and give it the status as a flex container.
content.html: To make the CSS flex method work, surround the <div> elements with another <div> element and give it the status as a flex container.

content.code_html:
<style>
.mycontainer {
  display: flex;
}
.mycontainer > div {
  width:33%;
}
</style>

content.text: Learn more about flex in our CSS flexbox tutorial .
content.html: Learn more about flex in our CSS flexbox tutorial.

content.text: Grid
The CSS Grid Layout Module offers a grid-based layout system, with rows and columns, making it easier to design web pages without having to use floats and positioning.
content.html: The CSS Grid Layout Module offers a grid-based layout system, with rows and columns, making it easier to design web pages without having to use floats and positioning.

content.text: Sounds almost the same as flex, but has the ability to define more than one row and position each row individually.
content.html: Sounds almost the same as flex, but has the ability to define more than one row and position each row individually.

content.text: The CSS grid method requires that you surround the <div> elements with another <div> element and give the status as a grid container, and you must specify the width of each column.
content.html: The CSS grid method requires that you surround the <div> elements with another <div> element and give the status as a grid container, and you must specify the width of each column.

content.code_html:
<style>
.grid-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 33% 33% 33%;
}
</style>

content.text: Learn more about grid in our CSS grid tutorial .
content.html: Learn more about grid in our CSS grid tutorial.

content.text: HTML Tags

content.code_html:
Tag Description
<div> Defines a section in a document (block-level)

content.text: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference .
content.html: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference.
